text: Steven Pasquale (pronounced ; born November 18, 1976) is an American actor and singer. He is best known for his role as the New York City Firefighter/First Responder Sean Garrity in the series Rescue Me. He also starred in the movie Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem and as Detective Mark Fuhrman in the miniseries The People v. O. J. Simpson: American Crime Story. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American tenors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:Singers from Pennsylvania
